featureDescriptions.The buzzer can be muted and alarmed manu: The buzzer can be muted and alarmed manually. During a smoke alarm, the buzzer can be manually muted for 80 seconds ("mute") and unmuted ("alarm"). The buzzer cannot be pre-muted, as this function only works during a smoke alarm. During the absence of a smoke alarm, the buzzer can be manually alarmed ("alarm") and disalarmed ("mute"), but for this "linkage_alarm" option must be enabled

During the absence of a gas alarm, the buzzer can be manually alarmed ("alarm") and disalarmed ("mute"), but for this "linkage_alarm" option must be enabled

featureDescriptions.Most recent region event. Event template: Most recent region event. Event template is "region_<REGION_ID>_<EVENT_TYPE>", where <REGION_ID> is region number (1-10), <EVENT_TYPE> is one of "enter", "leave", "occupied", "unoccupied". "enter" / "leave" events are usually triggered first, followed by "occupied" / "unoccupied" after a couple of seconds.
featureDescriptions.Definition of a new region to be added (: Definition of a new region to be added (or replace existing one). Creating or modifying a region requires you to define which zones of a 7x4 detection grid should be active for that zone. Regions can overlap, meaning that a zone can be defined in more than one region (eg. "zone x = 1 & y = 1" can be added to region 1 & 2). "Zone x = 1 & y = 1" is the nearest zone on the right (from sensor's perspective, along the detection path).

featureDescriptions.Specifies the maximum light output of th: Specifies the maximum light output of the ballast
featureDescriptions.Specifies the minimum level that shall b: Specifies the minimum level that shall be applied, when an on/toggle command causes the light to turn on. When this attribute is set to the invalid value (255) this feature is disabled and standard rules apply: The light will either return to the previously active level (before it was turned off) if the OnLevel attribute is set to the invalid value (255/previous); or to the specified value of the OnLevel attribute if this value is in the range 0…254. Otherwise, if the MinimumOnLevel is in the range 0…254, the light will be set to the the previously active level (before it was turned off), or the value specified here, whichever is the larger value. For example, if the previous level was 30 and the MinimumOnLevel was 40 then the light would turn on and move to level 40. Conversely, if the previous level was 50, and the MinimumOnLevel was 40, then the light would turn on and move to level 50.

featureDescriptions.If the heat sink is not fully opened wit: If the heat sink is not fully opened within two weeks or is not used for a long time, the valve will be blocked due to silting up and the heat sink will not be able to be used. To ensure normal use of the heat sink, the controller will automatically open the valve fully every two weeks. It will run for 30 seconds per time with the screen displaying "Ad", then return to its normal working state again.
featureDescriptions.When the room temperature is lower than: When the room temperature is lower than 5 °C, the valve opens; when the temperature rises to 8 °C, the valve closes.
featureDescriptions.If NTC is damaged, \"Er\" will be on the: If NTC is damaged, "Er" will be on the TRV display.

featureDescriptions.Battery life can be prolonged by switchi: Battery life can be prolonged by switching the heating off. To achieve this, the valve is closed fully. To activate the heating stop, the device display "HS", press the pair button to cancel.

featureDescriptions.Setting minimum 0 - maximum 465 seconds: Setting minimum 0 - maximum 465 seconds boost time. The boost (â¨) function is activated. The remaining time for the function will be counted down in seconds ( 465 to 0 ).
featureDescriptions.The holiday mode will automatically star: The holiday mode will automatically start at the set time starting point and run the holiday temperature. Can be defined in the following format: `startYear/startMonth/startDay startHours:startMinutes | endYear/endMonth/endDay endHours:endMinutes`. For example: `2022/10/01 16:30 | 2022/10/21 18:10`. After the end of holiday mode, it switches to "auto" mode and uses schedule.
featureDescriptions.`mon_sun` - schedule for Monday used for: `mon_sun` - schedule for Monday used for each day (define it only for Monday). `mon_fri+sat+sun` - schedule for workdays used from Monday (define it only for Monday), Saturday and Sunday are defined separately. `separate` - schedule for each day is defined separately.
Schedule will work with "auto" preset. In this mode, the device executes a preset week programming temperature time and temperature. Before using these properties, check `working_day` property. Each day can contain up to 10 segments. At least 1 segment should be defined. Different count of segments can be defined for each day, e.g., 3 segments for Monday, 5 segments for Thursday, etc. It should be defined in the following format: `hours:minutes/temperature`. Minutes can be only tens, i.e., 00, 10, 20, 30, 40, 50. Segments should be divided by space symbol. Each day should end with the last segment of 24:00. Examples: `04:00/20 08:30/22 10:10/18 18:40/24 22:50/19.5`; `06:00/21.5 17:20/26 24:00/18`. The temperature will be set from the beginning/start of one period and until the next period, e.g., `04:00/20 24:00/22` means that from 00:00 to 04:00 temperature will be 20 degrees and from 04:00 to 00:00 temperature will be 22 degrees.

HOLIDAY MODE ⛱ - In this mode, for example, the vacation mode is set for 10 days and the temperature is setto 15 degrees Celsius. featureDescriptions.The temperature sensor of the TRV is — d: The temperature sensor of the TRV is — due to its design — relatively close to the heat source (i.e. the hot water in the radiator). Thus there are situations where the `local_temperature` measured by the TRV is not accurate enough: If the radiator is covered behind curtains or furniture, if the room is rather big, or if the radiator itself is big and the flow temperature is high, then the temperature in the room may easily diverge from the `local_temperature` measured by the TRV by 5°C to 8°C. In this case you might choose to use an external room sensor and send the measured value of the external room sensor to the `External_measured_room_sensor` property.The way the TRV operates on the `External_measured_room_sensor` depends on the setting of the `Radiator_covered` property: If `Radiator_covered` is `false` (Auto Offset Mode): You *must* set the `External_measured_room_sensor` property *at least* every 3 hours. After 3 hours the TRV disables this function and resets the value of the `External_measured_room_sensor` property to -8000 (disabled). You *should* set the `External_measured_room_sensor` property *at most* every 30 minutes or every 0.1K change in measured room temperature.If `Radiator_covered` is `true` (Room Sensor Mode): You *must* set the `External_measured_room_sensor` property *at least* every 30 minutes. After 35 minutes the TRV disables this function and resets the value of the `External_measured_room_sensor` property to -8000 (disabled). You *should* set the `External_measured_room_sensor` property *at most* every 5 minutes or every 0.1K change in measured room temperature.
featureDescriptions.Controls whether the TRV should solely r: Controls whether the TRV should solely rely on an external room sensor or operate in offset mode. `false` = Auto Offset Mode (use this e.g. for exposed radiators) or `true` = Room Sensor Mode (use this e.g. for covered radiators). Please note that this flag only controls how the TRV operates on the value of `External_measured_room_sensor`; only setting this flag without setting the `External_measured_room_sensor` has no (noticeable?) effect.
featureDescriptions.Whether or not the window open feature i: Whether or not the window open feature is enabled
featureDescriptions.0=Quarantine, 1=Windows are closed, 2=Ho: 0=Quarantine, 1=Windows are closed, 2=Hold - Windows are maybe about to open, 3=Open window detected, 4=In window open state from external but detected closed locally
featureDescriptions.Set if the window is open or close. This: Set if the window is open or close. This setting will trigger a change in the internal window and heating demand. `false` (windows are closed) or `true` (windows are open)
featureDescriptions.Exercise trigger time. Minutes since mid: Exercise trigger time. Minutes since midnight (65535=undefined). Range 0 to 1439
featureDescriptions.Scale factor of setpoint filter timecons: Scale factor of setpoint filter timeconstant ("aggressiveness" of control algorithm) 1= Quick ...  5=Moderate ... 10=Slow
featureDescriptions.Whether or not the thermostat acts as st: Whether or not the thermostat acts as standalone thermostat or shares load with other thermostats in the room. The gateway must update load_room_mean if enabled.
featureDescriptions.Mean radiator load for room calculated b: Mean radiator load for room calculated by gateway for load balancing purposes (-8000=undefined)
featureDescriptions.Specific for pre-heat running in Zigbee: Specific for pre-heat running in Zigbee Weekly Schedule mode
featureDescriptions.Status of adaptation run: None (before f: Status of adaptation run: None (before first run), In Progress, Valve Characteristic Found, Valve Characteristic Lost
featureDescriptions.Automatic adaptation run enabled (the on: Automatic adaptation run enabled (the one during the night)
featureDescriptions.Adaptation run control: Initiate Adaptat: Adaptation run control: Initiate Adaptation Run or Cancel Adaptation Run
featureDescriptions.Regulation SetPoint Offset in range -2.5: Regulation SetPoint Offset in range -2.5°C to 2.5°C in steps of 0.1°C. Value 2.5°C = 25.
featureDescriptions.Adjust Report Delay. Setting the time in: Adjust Report Delay. Setting the time in minutes, by default 5 minutes
featureDescriptions.Setting the altitude above sea level (fo: Itsas mailarekiko altueraren ezarpena (CO2 sentsorearen zehaztasun handirako)
featureDescriptions.Start Manual FRC (Perform Forced Recalib: FRC behartua hasi (CO2 Sentsorearen rekalibrazio behartua)
featureDescriptions.Enable or Disable Auto Brightness of the: Enable or Disable Auto Brightness of the Display
featureDescriptions.The period of plotting the CO2 level(OFF: The period of plotting the CO2 level(OFF - 1H | ON - 24H)
featureDescriptions.Adjust Report Delay, by default 60 minut: Adjust Report Delay, by default 60 minutes
featureDescriptions.Adjust Report Delay. Setting the time in: Adjust Report Delay. Setting the time in minutes, by default 15 minutes
featureDescriptions.Transmit power, supported from firmware: Transmit power, supported from firmware 20221102. The max for CC1352 is 20 dBm and 5 dBm for CC2652 (any higher value is converted to 5dBm)
featureDescriptions.The device sends commands with this grou: The device sends commands with this group ID. Put devices in this group to control them.
featureDescriptions.Indicates whether there is an active wat: Indicates whether there is an active water leak
featureDescriptions.Physical input on the device enabled/dis: Physical input on the device enabled/disabled
featureDescriptions.Load in W when heating is on (between 0-: Load in W when heating is on (between 0-3600 W). The thermostat uses the value as input to the mean_power calculation.
featureDescriptions.Displayed text on thermostat display (zo: Displayed text on thermostat display (zone). Max 19 characters
featureDescriptions.Setpoint in %, use only when the thermos: Setpoint in %, use only when the thermostat is in regulator mode.
featureDescriptions.Current temperature measured from the ai: Current temperature measured from the air sensor
featureDescriptions.The device sends commands with this grou: The device sends commands with this group ID. Put dvices in this group to control them.
featureDescriptions.Specifies the initialisation light level: Specifies the initialisation light level. Can not be set lower than "ballast_minimum_level"
featureDescriptions.Current temperature measured on the exte: Current temperature measured on the external sensor (floor)
featureDescriptions.The difference between the temperature a: The difference between the temperature at which the thermostat switches off, and the temperature at which it switches on again.
Prevent changes. `false` = run normally. `true` = prevent from making changes.
featureDescriptions.Blinks the built-in LED to make it easie: Blinks the built-in LED to make it easier to find the device
featureDescriptions.Module controlled by a rocker switch or: Module controlled by a rocker switch or a button
featureDescriptions.Specifies the brightness value of the di: Specifies the brightness value of the display
featureDescriptions.Input for remote temperature sensor. Set: Input for remote temperature sensor. Setting this will disable the internal temperature sensor until batteries are removed!
featureDescriptions.Set thermostat hysteresis low and high t: Set thermostat hysteresis low and high trigger values. (1 = 0.01ºC)
featureDescriptions.Enable or disable the blue backlight LED: Enable or disable the blue backlight LED
featureDescriptions.Ac louver position of this device: Ac louver position of this device

featureNames.rampRateOffToOnRemote: Ramp Rate Off To On Remote
featureNames.rampRateOffToOnLocal: Ramp Rate Off To On Local
featureNames.rampRateOnToOffRemote: Ramp Rate On To Off Remote
featureNames.rampRateOnToOffLocal: Ramp Rate On To Off Local
featureNames.brightnessLevelForDoubleTapUp: Brightness Level For Double Tap Up
featureNames.brightnessLevelForDoubleTapDown: Brightness Level For Double Tap Down
featureNames.bindingOffToOnSyncLevel: Binding Off To On Sync Level

map.help_lqi_description: Lotura kalitatea 0 eta 255 artean (handiagoa hobea), balioak / dituenean lotura anitza esan nahi du

settingsSchemaDescriptions.Home Assistant legacy triggers, when ena: Home Assistant legacy triggers, when enabled Zigbee2mqt will send an empty 'action' or 'click' after one has been send. A 'sensor_action' and 'sensor_click' will be discoverd
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Home Assistant legacy entity attributes,: Home Assistant legacy entity attributes, when enabled Zigbee2MQTT will add state attributes to each entity, additional to the separate entities and devices it already creates
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Time after which an active device will b: Igarotako denbora gailu aktiboa lineaz kanpo dagoela adierazteko (minututan)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Time after which an passive device will: Igarotako denbora gailu pasiboa lineaz kanpo dagoela adierazteko (minututan)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Checks whether devices are online/offlin: Gailuak sarean/lineaz kanpo ote dauden egiaztatzen du
Kanpo bihurgailuak defini ditzakezu, adibidez DiY gailua onartzeko
settingsSchemaDescriptions.MQTT base topic for Zigbee2MQTT MQTT mes: Zigbee2MQTT MQTT mezuentzako MQTT oinarrizko gaia
settingsSchemaDescriptions.MQTT server URL (use mqtts:// for SSL/TL: MQTT zerbitzariaren URLa (erabili mqtts:// SSL/TLS konexioetarako)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Absolute path to SSL/TLS certificate of: Bezero edo zerbitzariak sinatzeko erabiltzen diren SSL/TLS zertifikatuentzako bide absolutua
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Absolute path to SSL/TLS key for client-: Bezeroen autentifikazio SSL/TLS gakoetarako bide absolutua
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Absolute path to SSL/TLS certificate for: Bezeroen autentifikazio SSL/TLS zertifikatuetarako bide absolutua
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Disable retain for all send messages. ON: Disable retain for all send messages. ONLY enable if you MQTT broker doesn't support retained message (e.g. AWS IoT core, Azure IoT Hub, Google Cloud IoT core, IBM Watson IoT Platform). Enabling will break the Home Assistant integration
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Location of the adapter. To autodetect t: Egokitzailearen kokapena. Ataka automatikoki detektatzeko null-ean ezarri
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Disable LED of the adapter if supported: Egokitzailearen LED argia desgaitu, funtzioa onartzen bada
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Adapter type, not needed unless you are: Egokitzaile moeta, ez da beharrezkoa arazorik izan ezean
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Baud rate speed for serial port, this ca: Baud rate speed for serial port, this can be anything firmware support but default is 115200 for Z-Stack and EZSP, 38400 for Deconz, however note that some EZSP firmware need 57600
settingsSchemaDescriptions.RTS / CTS Hardware Flow Control for seri: RTS / CTS Hardware Flow Control for serial port
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Allow only certain devices to join the n: Mugatu sarera lotzea gailu jakinentara (ieeeAddr bidez). Onartutako gailuen zerrendatik kanpo dauden gailu guztiak saretik ezabatuko dira!
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Your device may request a check for a ne: Zure gailuak firmwarea eguneratzeko eskaera egin dezake. Balio honek bestelako zerbitzariak firmware berrian bila zer nolako maiztasunarekin begiratzen diren ezartzen du. Balioa minututan dago eta lehenetsitako balioa egun batetakoa da.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Zigbee devices may request a firmware up: Zigbee devices may request a firmware update, and do so frequently, causing Zigbee2MQTT to reach out to third party servers. If you disable these device initiated checks, you can still initiate a firmware update check manually.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Use IKEA TRADFRI OTA test server, see OT: Erabili IKEA TRADFRI OTA aprobatako zerbitzaria, begiratu OTA eguneraketen dokumentazioa
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Frontend binding port. Ignored when usin: Frontend lotzeko ataka. Unix domeinuko socketa erabiltzerakoan baztertuta
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Frontend binding host. Binds to a unix s: Frontend lotzeko ostalaria. Bide absolutoa ematerakoan unix socket-era lotzen da.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.URL on which the frontend can be reached: Frontend-a URL on which the frontend can be reached, currently only used for the Home Assistant device configuration page
settingsSchemaDescriptions.SSL Certificate file path for exposing H: HTTPSrako SSL zertifikatuaren fitxeroaren bidea. 'ssl_key' propietatea ezarri behar da HTTPS gaitzeko.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.SSL key file path for exposing HTTPS. Th: HTTPSrako SSL gako fitxeroaren bidea. 'ssl_cert' propietatea ezarri behar da HTTPS gaitzeko.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Payload to be used for device availabili: Gailuaren erabilgarritasun eta zubi/egoera gaietarako erabili behar den mezua. true = testua, false = JSON
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Create symlink to current logs in the lo: Sortu esteka sinbolikoa uneko erregistroen direktorioko erregistroetara
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Output location of the log, leave empty: Erregistroen irteera kokapena, hutsik utzi erregistroa desgaitzeko
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Log file name, can also contain timestam: Erregistroen fitxategi izena, denbora marka izan dezake
settingsSchemaDescriptions.The host running syslogd, defaults to lo: syslogd exekutatzen ari den ostalaria, lehenetsia localhost.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.The port on the host that syslog is runn: syslog exekutatzen ari den zerbitzariaren portua, lehenetsia syslogd-en portu lehenetsia.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.The network protocol to log over (e.g. t: Erregistroak bidaltzeko protokoloa (e.b. tcp4, udp4, tls4, unix, unix-connect, eta abar).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.The path to the syslog dgram socket (i.e: The path to the syslog dgram socket (i.e. /dev/log or /var/run/syslog for OS X).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.PID of the process that log messages are: Erregistro mezuak datozen prozesuaren PID-a adierazten du (Lehenetsia process.pid).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Host to indicate that log messages are c: Erregistro mezuak zein ostalaritik datozen adierazten du (Lehenetsia: localhost).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.The type of the syslog protocol to use (: Erabili beharreko syslog protokoloa (Lehenetsia: BSD, ere baliozkoa: 5424).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.The end of line character to be added to: Mezuen amaieran gehitu beharreko lerro amaiera karakterea (Lehenetsia: Mezua aldaketarik gabe utzi).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.ZigBee pan ID, changing requires repairi: ZigBee pan ID, aldatzeak gailu guztiak berriro parekatzea behartzen du!
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Zigbee extended pan ID, changing require: Zigbee hedatutako pan ID, aldatzeak gailu guztiak berriro parekatzea behartzen du!
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Zigbee channel, changing requires repair: Zigbee kanala, aldatzeak gailu guztiak berriro parekatzea behartzen du! (Oharra: erabili ZLL kanala: 11, 15, 20, edo 25 arazoak sahiesteko)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Adapter concurrency (e.g. 2 for CC2531 o: Egokitzailearen aldiberekotasuna (e.b. 2 CC2531 edo 16 CC26X2R1) (lehenetsia: null, gomendatutako balioa erabiltzen du)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.MQTT message payload will contain all at: MQTT karga mezuak atributo guztiak dauzka, eta ez bakarrik aldatutakoak. Balioa true izan behar du Home Assistant-ekin integratzerakoan
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Persist cached state, only used when cac: Cache-ko egoera jarraitua, cache_state: true denerako bakarrik erabiltzen da
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Send cached state on startup, only used: Martxan jartzean cache-ko egoera bidali, cache_state: true denean bakarrik erabiltzen da
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Add a last_seen attribute to MQTT messag: Gehitu last_seen atributoa MQTT mezuei, aurreko Zigbee mezuaren data/orduarekin
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Add an elapsed attribute to MQTT message: Gehitu elapsed atributoa MQTT mezuei, aurreko mezuarekiko milisegunduekin
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Network encryption key, changing require: Sarea enkriptatzeko gakoa, aldatzeak gailu guztiak berriro parekatzea behartzen du!
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Transmit power of adapter, only availabl: Egokitzailearen potentzia bidali, Z-Stack (CC253*/CC2652/CC1352) egokitzailetarako bakarrik erabilgarria, CC2652 = 5dbm, CC1352 maximoa = 20dbm (lehenetsia 5dbm)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Examples when 'state' of a device is pub: Gailuaren 'state' publikatzerakoan json adibideak: topic: 'zigbee2mqtt/my_bulb' karga '{"state": "ON"}' attribute: gaia 'zigbee2mqtt/my_bulb/state' karga 'ON' attribute_and_json: biak json eta attribute (begiratu goian)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Home Assistant legacy triggers, when ena: Home Assistant legacy triggers, when enabled Zigbee2mqt will send an empty 'action' or 'click' after one has been send. A 'sensor_action' and 'sensor_click' will be discovered
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Used in the MQTT topic of a device. By d: Gailuaren MQTT gai gisa erabilia. Gailuaren ID da bere balio lehenetsia
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Disables the device (excludes device fro: Gailua desgaitzen du (gailua sareko miaketa, erabilgarritasun eta talde egoeratik kanpo uzten du)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Sets the MQTT Message Expiry in seconds,: MQTT Mezuaren Iraungitzea segundutan ezartzen du, Ziurtatu mqtt.version 5-n ezartzea
settingsSchemaDescriptions.QoS level for MQTT messages of this devi: Gailu honen MQTT mezuentzako QoS maila
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Protects unique payload values of specif: Zehaztutako karga-mezuko propietateen karga balioak gainidatzitik babesten ditu errebote-denbora barruan
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Publish optimistic state after set: Ezarri ondoren egoera baikorra argitaratzen du
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Filter attributes with regex from publis: Argitaratutako mezuen atributuak regex bidez iragazi.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Filter attributes with regex from being: Katxera gehitzen diren atributuak regex bidez iragazi, honek, balioa aldatu ez denean atributua argitaratutako mezuan azaltzea sahiesten du.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Filter attributes with regex from optimi: Argitarapen baikorretik atributuak regex bidez iragazi /set deitzean. (Honek ez du eraginik optimistic false denean).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.The user-defined device icon for the fro: Erabiltzaileak definitutako frontend-en erabiltzeko gailuarentzako ikonoa. Irudirako URL helbide osoa izan daiteke (e.b. https://SOME.SITE/MODEL123.jpg) (ezin da fitxero lokal baterako helbidea erabili) edo base64-n kodifikatutako (e.b. image/svg+xml;base64,PHN2ZyB3aW....R0aD)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Control when to publish state OFF for a: Control when to publish state OFF for a group. 'all_members_off': only publish state OFF when all group members are in state OFF, 'last_member_state': publish state OFF whenever one of its members changes to OFF

settingsSchemaTitles.IKEA TRADFRI OTA use test url: IKEA TRADFRI OTA use test url
settingsSchemaTitles.IKEA TRADFRI OTA use test url (deprecate: IKEA TRADFRI OTA use test url (zaharkitua)
